item.title: Riding in Granada, Spain
item.description: I like traveling. Bragging facts: at the moment I’ve visited 15 countries and 32 places, spent in total 102 days traveling. Since I got my motorbike license, I had 2 trips that went particularly well: Lanzarote and this one â€“ Granada in Spain. What’s different? This time my wife and I rented a motorbike and went exploring. In fact, it went so well with Lanzarote that in Granada we even took a guided tour from a local company (details later) and started filming our trip on camera (only pictures before). What a beautiful footage’s come out! It was totally worth doing.

item.title: Riding on Lanzarote, Spain
item.description: This is the first time we went somewhere after I got my motorbike license, so “why not rent a bike and explore the whole island by riding together” we thought. Now, looking back, I’d say it was a bit sketchy because I had not have enough experience riding in mountains before but, in the end, it went well, I was very careful and didn’t try to ride above my abilities.
